root: ^Warrior Amilia, quick! Follow the main squad and evacuate from here, forget about me!
^Remu fortress is my home, the place where I lived happily with my wife.
^A few years ago she died, I shall keep her company by staying here.
^I want to protect Remu fortress till the end.
^Even after hundreds of brave warriors sacrificing themselves,
^is it still not enough to stop this tragedy from happening?
